---
title: vm-live-indicator
sidebar_label: LiveIndicator
---

import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs'
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem'

This can be used to indicate to the user that the current media is being streamed live.

## Visual

<img
  src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vime-js/vime/master/packages/core/src/components/ui/live-indicator/live-indicator.png"
  alt="Vime live indicator component"
/>

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

<TabItem value="html">

```html {7}
<vm-player>
  <!-- ... -->
  <vm-ui>
    <!-- ... -->
    <vm-controls>
      <!-- ... -->
      <vm-live-indicator></vm-live-indicator>
    </vm-controls>
  </vm-ui>
</vm-player>
```

</TabItem>


<TabItem value="react">

```tsx {6,16}
import React from 'react';
import { Player, Ui, Controls, LiveIndicator } from '@vime/react';

function Example() {
  return (
    <Player>
      {/* ... */}
      <Ui>
        {/* ... */}
        <Controls>
          <LiveIndicator />
        </Controls>
      </Ui>
    </Player>
  );
}
```

</TabItem>

## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                        | Description                          |
| --------------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| `--vm-live-indicator-color` | The color of the live indicator dot. |

## Dependencies

### Used by
